Credits

Harlon makes use of many open-source plugins, resources and more to create the best experience for our players. It's only right we credit them on a dedicated page. If your work is listed here and you would like the credit to be corrected/altered, please contact us through our Discord server.

Server Plugins
Plugin Name Author Licence Purpose

AdvancedRegionMarket

alex9849

Open-source, but no license specified.

The system powering all shops and properties around the server by allowing WorldGuard regions to be bought and sold.

BKCommonLib

bergerhealer

MIT

A common library for certain plugins, including TrainCarts, SignLink, TCCoasters and LightCleaner.

Brewery

DieReicheErethons

GPL 3.0

Powers the server's brewing system that allows players to brew alcoholic drinks.

BuyCraftX (now known as Tebex)

Tebex Limited (part of Overwolf)

MIT

The plugin which the server store system connects to to execute commands upon purchase (i.e., to allow players who've purchased Donator ranks or particle effects to receive these in-game). Still bears the name of BuyCraftX even though the server store system is now called Tebex.

Christmas Calendar

Phloxz

Closed source/proprietary

Provides the advent calendar system for Christmas. Hooks into the Christmas Presents plugin (see below) to prvide gifts.

Christmas Presents

Phloxz

Closed source/proprietary

Provides Christmas Presents for the above Christmas Calendar plugin.

Citizens (Premium Plugin)

thefullwall

Closed source/proprietary

Provides NPCs for various server purposes, such as Quests and for decoration.

Colored Books

VanillaChai/Chailotl

GPL 3.0

Enables coloured books to be read/written on the server.

Colored Signs

SirBlobman, SwaggerGamer

GPL 3.0

Enables coloured signs to be seen/made on the server.

Command Hook

_NewAge/NewAgeCZ

GPL 3.0

The plugin which the server store system connects to to execute commands upon purchase (i.e., to allow players who've purchased Donator ranks or particle effects to receive these in-game). Still bears the name of BuyCraftX even though the server store system is now called Tebex.

CoreProtect

PlayPro

Artistic 2.0

Provides server protection against griefing, vandalism etc.

DiscordSRV

DiscordSRV Contributors

GPL 3.0

Enables server chat, player join, leave and AFK messages and server messages to be syndicated onto our Discord server.

DiscordSRV-Staff-Chat

DiscordSRV Contributors

MIT

Builds upon DiscordSRV to also provide a staff chat that can be used across both the server and Discord server, with messages being syndicated across the two platforms.

Dynmap®

WebBukkit

Apache 2.0

The plugin that powers the server's dynmap. Harlon does not use the default frontend and instead uses the LiveAtlas as a frontend (see the Miscellaneous resources section) plus icons derived from Google's Material Design Icons (see Miscellaneous section).

Elevators_v2

Pecacheu

GPL 3.0

Powers the server's elevators.

EssentialsX

EssentialsX Contributors

GPL 3.0

A common server plugin that provides a range of features for servers including the /home and /warp commands, private messaging, teleportation and more.

EssentialsXChat

EssentialsX Contributors

GPL 3.0

An extension of EssentialsX (see above) that provides features such as chat formatting and local chat.

EssentialsXSpawn

EssentialsX Contributors

GPL 3.0

An extension of EssentialsX (see above) that provides features such as spawnpoint contorl and per-player spawns.

Geyser-Spigot (Geyser for Spigot)

GeyserMC Contributors/p>

MIT

Provides Bedrock compatibility for the server.

HarJobs

WizardlyBump17

Closed source/proprietary

Powers the server's jobs system.

HeadDatabase (Premium Plugin)

Arcaniax-Development

Closed source/proprietary

Provides custom Minecraft player heads for various decorational purposes on the server.

HockeyBlockey

WizardlyBump17

Closed source/proprietary

The plugin that powers the server's hockey experience.

HolographicDisplays

filoghost

GPL 3.0

Provides floating text (holograms) on the server, such as those seen at spawn and at Cerulean Harbour on the Lumea Isles.

HubParkour

Block2Block

Apache 2.0

Powers the server's various parkour mini-games.

Iciwi

Mineshafter61

MIT

Powers the Go2 card, the transit smartcard used for public transport on the server.

ImageMaps

SydMontague

MIT

Allows for images (i.e., signage, advertising) to be displayed in-game.

LightCleaner

Team Bergerhealer

MIT

Provides light regeneration for the server.

LuckPerms

LuckPerms Contributors

MIT

Provides permission settings for the server.

MikesTCAddons

Mineshafter61

GPL 3.0

Powers one of the server's manual train driving options and provides various tweaks to TrainCarts.

Multiverse-Core

Multiverse Contributors

BSD 3-Clause

Provides world management features for the server.

Multiverse-Inventories

Multiverse Contributors

BSD 3-Clause

Allows for separated player statistics and inventories per world.

PaintballBattle

Ajneb96

MIT

Powers the server's paintball mini-game.

PLAN

PLAN Contributors

LGPL 3.0

Provides analytics gathering and display of data on the server.

PlayerParticles

Rosewood-Development

CC BY-NC-SA 4.0

Provides player particle effects, a perk for donators who have purchased it from our Server Store.

ProtocolLib

dmulloy2, aadnk

GPL 2.0

A common library for certain server plugins, including XYZ

Quests

PikaMug

Custom License (derived from 3-clause BSD license's liability paragraph)

Powers the server's quests experiences.

QuickShop (QuickShop Reremake)

PotatoCraft-Studio/sandtechnology

GPL 3.0

Powers the server's chest shop system.

QuickTax

fruznfever/tjtanjin/FrozenFever

Closed source/proprietary

Powers the server's taxation system.

SignEdit

Deltik

GPL 3.0

A common library for certain server plugins, including XYZ

SignLink

Team Bergerhealer

Open-source, but no license specified.

Powers the server's dynamic signs, such as those used for train departure boards.

spark

Luck/lucko

GPL 3.0

Provides server health and performance statistics and reports.

Stocks (Stock Market Plugin, Premium Plugin)

Unknown

Closed-source/proprietary

Powers the server's stock market.

TAB

NEZNAMY

Open-source, but no license specified.

Powers the server's TAB menu, that appears when players press TAB.

TCCoasters

Team Bergerhealer

MIT

Powers the server's moving vehicles without rails, such as buses. Builds upon the TrainCarts plugin (see below).

TimeIsMoney

MasterCake/mastercake10

GPL 3.0

Powers the server's gameplay rewards system, handing out server monetary rewards for a certain amount of time players are in-game.

TrainCarts

Team Bergerhealer

MIT

Powers the server's trains and other moving vehicles (through TCCoasters).

UltimateAutoRestart

Norska

Closed-source/proprietary

Provides a system for scheduled daily server restarts.

Vault

Sleaker/milkbowl

LGPL 3.0

The server's Permissions, Chat and Economy API.

Vehicles (Premium Plugin)

Unknown

Closed-source/proprietary

Provides the server's rideable cars, bikes and planes.

ViaBackwards

ViaVersion Contributors

GPL 3.0

Provides backward compatibility for older Minecraft: Java Edition clients joining the server.

ViaVersion

ViaVersion Contributors

GPL 3.0

Provides forward compatibility for newer Minecraft: Java Edition clients joining the server.

nuVotifier

Tux

GPL 3.0

Powers the system that receives votes from server voting pages and then passes it onto VotingPlugin to distribute monetary rewards (see below).

VotingPlugin

BenCodez

Open-source, but no license specified.

Powers the system that hands out monetary rewards to players for voting on server voting pages.

WGEF-Reborn (DISCONTINUED)

Invvk

MIT

Provides extra WorldGuard Region flags (see below) to enable the server's semi-auto public transport services to function.

WLbib

WizardlyBump17

Open-source, but no license specified.

A common library for plugins written by WizardlyBump17, including HockeyBlockey and HarJobs.

WorldBorder

PryPurity

BSD 2-Clause

Powers the system that hands out monetary rewards to players for voting on server voting pages.

WorldEdit

EngineHub

GPL 3.0

Provides advanced building tools allowing faster and more efficient building on the server.

WorldEditSelectionVisualizer

MrMickey

MIT

Builds on top of WorldEdit (see above) to add a selection visualizer.

WorldGuard

EngineHub

GPL 3.0

Allows regions to be designated for protection. Also powers the server's semi-auto public transport services through WGEF-Reborn (see above).
Miscellaneous
Resource Name Author Licence Purpose

Manrope

Mikhail Sharanda

Open Font License 1.1

Harlon City Server brand font.

Material Icons

Google

Apache 2.0

Icons for the Integrated Wayfinding System (HIWS) as well as the Dynmap.

New South Wales Design System

Digital.NSW/NSW Department of Customer Service

MIT

Base framework for the Harlon City Server website (you're on it right now!) and the HarlonTransit website.

HTML5 Boilerplate

H5BP

MIT

Base file structure/template for all Harlon City Server-related websites (including this one).

One

one.com

N/A

Domain registrar for the harlonserver.net domain

GitHub Pages

GitHub, Inc.

N/A

Web hosting provider for HCS websites and files (excluding the SHIFT banking system).

Bloom.host

AME Hosting, LLC.

N/A

Minecraft server hosting provider.

Tebex

Tebex Limited (part of Overwolf)

Closed source/proprietary

Server store provider.

LiveAtlas

James Lyne (JLyne)

Apache 2.0 License

The frontend for Harlon's Dynmap. Preferred over dynmap's default frontend due to its better performance, customisability and responsiveness on mobile devices.

Minecraft PFP

Maurits Wilke, Leialoha

Open-source, but no license specified.

Provides avatars for the Server Staff, Former Server Staff, Donor Hall of Fame sections on this website's About page.

HCS Texture Pack

HHL Components: Optimized_, WizardlyBump17, muffinbarde; 3D Trains/Buses: Antlucl, Keonian_; Jobs Uniforms/Clothes: Azmat97; Guns: MisleadingJoke

Proprietary

The main Harlon server resource pack, providing the components required for Harlon's hockey gameplay experience, 3D trains and buses, and the HarJobs plugin.
